price: (Mose) kaa sε: ”Sε Nyankopͻn pε a, wobɛhunu sε me wͻ aboterε na menyε w’ahyεdeε nso ho asoͻden “.
arabic: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرٗا وَلَآ أَعۡصِي لَكَ أَمۡرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla satajidunī in shāa al-lahu ṣābiran walā aʿṣī laka amran
